item.title: devAny - Coding with editor, terminal and browser on iPhone/iPad
item.description: What is devAny? Coding with iOS device Free to choose your backend Mondatory tools (Terminal, Browser and Editor) Operate with only keybaord devAny is a mobile application that provides a development environment. The programmer needs three things, 1) Terminal 2) Editor and 3) Browser and devAny provides them. This is not replacing current development environment like desktop or laptop but more like support remote work without PCs or educational purposes that people don’t have own PCs.
